function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"WSN based systems using Zig-Bee as the communication protocol","Impact":"Increased energy consumption in sensor networks","Mitigation":"Implement energy-saving techniques and battery power management","Technologies":"Energy-efficient sensor nodes and battery management systems","People":"Researchers, developers, and stakeholders in WSN-based IAQ monitoring systems","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"High latency in WSN-based IAQ monitoring systems","Impact":"Delay in real-time monitoring and alerts","Mitigation":"Optimize communication protocols and implement real-time alert systems","Technologies":"Low-latency communication protocols and real-time alert platforms","People":"Researchers, developers, and stakeholders in WSN-based IAQ monitoring systems","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"IoT based systems for IAQ monitoring","Impact":"Increased reliance on IoT systems for IAQ measurement","Mitigation":"Diversify monitoring methods and ensure reliability of IoT systems","Technologies":"Diverse sensor networks and reliability testing tools","People":"Researchers, industrial manufacturers, and stakeholders in IoT-based IAQ monitoring systems","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"}]}
